ARABIC: إِنَّمَا ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ يُخَوِّفُ أَوْلِيَآءَهُۥ فَلَا تَخَافُوهُمْ وَخَافُونِ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It was only Shaytan frightening you through his friends. But do not fear them - fear Me if you are
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is no one but Satan who frightens you with his allies. But do not fear him, fear Me, if indeed you are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It was Satan who suggested to you the fear of his allies. Do not fear them; fear Me, if you truly believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is Satan who frightens his friends. Do not be afraid of them (enemies) but have fear of Me if you truly believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is the devil who threatens with his friends; so do not fear them and fear Me, if you have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is only Shaytan that suggests to you the fear of his friends; so fear them not, but fear Me, if you are indeed believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It is only the Shaitan that causes you to fear from his friends, but do not fear them, and fear Me if you are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is Satan frightening his friends, therefore do not fear them; but fear you Me, if you are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is only the devil who would make (men) fear his partisans. Fear them not; fear Me, if ye are true believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is Satan who instills fear [into you] of his followers; do not fear them. But fear Me, if you are true believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is only that the Satan frighteth you of his friends, wherefore fear them not, but fear Me, if ye are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is only Satan frightening [you] of his followers! So fear them not, and fear Me, should you be faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is only the Evil One that suggests to you the fear of his votaries: Be ye not afraid of them, but fear Me, if ye have Faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is only Shaitan (Satan) that suggests to you the fear of his Auliya' [supporters and friends (polytheists, disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah and in His Messenger, Muhammad SAW)], so fear them not, but fear Me, if you are (true) believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That is satan frightening those whom he sponsored. So do not fear them, and fear Me, if you are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is only Satan frightening his partisans; so do not fear them, but fear Me, if you are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is only Satan who frightens [you] of his supporters. So fear them not, but fear Me, if you are [indeed] believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:175] That, namely, the one saying to you, ‘The people [have gathered against you]’ to the end [of the verse], is only Satan making, you, fear his friends, the disbelievers, therefore do not fear them; but fear Me, lest you abandon My command, if you are, truly, believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is only the devil) the one who was scaring you with ways of the devil, i.e. Nu'aym Ibn Mas'ud. Allah called him a devil because he was a follower of Satan and his whisperings (who would make (men) fear his partisans) He says: he makes you fear his partisans: the unbelievers. (Fear them not) in your sortie; (fear Me) if you stay back, (if you are true believers) if you believe in His bringing back the dead to life.
